channel.title: UIZE JavaScript Framework | Latest News
channel.description: UIZE JavaScript Framework (AJAX, RIA, widgets, JSON, OOP, Class Inheritance, XMLHttpRequest, DOM manipulation, and all that stuff)

image.title: UIZE JavaScript Framework | Latest News
image.description: UIZE JavaScript Framework (AJAX, RIA, widgets, JSON, OOP, Class Inheritance, XMLHttpRequest, DOM manipulation, and all that stuff)

item.title: 2012-07-22 - New once Instances Method for Classes
item.description: The Uize.Class module, that implements the class mechanism for the UIZE JavaScript Framework, has been improved with the addition of a once instance method for set-get properties.

item.title: 2012-07-08 - Build Script Modules Migrated
item.description: Various build scripts used for building the UIZE project and the uize.com Web site have been migrated.

item.title: 2012-07-07 - Auto-derived Scruncher Mappings
item.description: With a recent improvement in the auto scruncher (implemented in the Uize.Build.AutoScruncher module), it is no longer necessary to specify unique mappings for scrunched identifier names in a ScruncherSettings comment in source files.

item.title: 2012-06-27 - New Uize.resolveMatcher Method
item.description: The new Uize.resolveMatcher static method, implemented in the Uize base module, resolves the specified matcher (of any type) to a matcher function.

item.title: 2012-06-25 - New Uize.resolveTransformer Method
item.description: The new Uize.resolveTransformer static method, implemented in the Uize base module, resolves the specified transformer (of any type) to a transformer function.

item.title: 2012-06-23 - New Uize.isRegExp Method
item.description: The new Uize.isRegExp static method, implemented in the Uize base module, returns a boolean, indicating whether or not the specified value is a regular expression (ie. an instance of JavaScript's built-in RegExp object).

item.title: 2012-05-05 - UIZE Adds Support for Singletons
item.description: UIZE has added support for singletons in the form of the new Uize.Class.singleton static method implemented in the Uize.Class base class and inherited by all Uize.Class subclasses.

item.title: 2012-03-24 - New Uize.canExtend Method
item.description: The new Uize.canExtend static method, implemented in the Uize base module, returns a boolean, indicating whether or not the specified value can be extended with custom properties.

item.title: 2012-02-19 - NEW MODULE: Uize.Data.Combinations
item.description: The new Uize.Data.Combinations module provides methods for generating object or array combinations from a combination specifier, with support for an optional combination transformer and combination matcher.

item.title: 2012-01-28 - New Uize.now Method
item.description: The new Uize.now static method, implemented in the Uize base module, returns the current time in milliseconds since 1970 (POSIX time).

item.title: 2012-01-22 - New Uize.mergeInto Method
item.description: The new Uize.mergeInto static method, implemented in the Uize base module, merges the contents of one or more source objects into the specified target object, and returns the target object as the result.

item.title: 2012-01-15 - New Uize.getClass Method
item.description: The new Uize.getClass static method, implemented in the Uize base module, gets the class of which a specified value is an instance, or returns the value if it is a class or function.

item.title: 2012-01-14 - New Uize.toNumber Method
item.description: The new Uize.toNumber static method, implemented in the Uize base module, lets you coerce a value to a number, with defaulting if it cannot be coerced successfully.

item.title: 2012-01-12 - New Uize.isSameAs Method
item.description: The new Uize.isSameAs static method tests if two values are the same in a strict equality test, with support for NaN values.

item.title: 2012-01-11 - New Uize.isNaN Method
item.description: The new Uize.isNaN static method, implemented in the Uize base module, returns a boolean value, indicating whether or not the specified value is the JavaScript special value NaN.

item.title: 2012-01-10 - Class Mechanism Moved Into Uize.Class
item.description: The class mechanism that was implemented in the Uize module has been moved out of that module and into the new Uize.Class module.

item.title: 2011-12-26 - New Uize.isList Static Method
item.description: The new Uize.isList static method returns a boolean, indicating whether or not the specified value is considered a list.

item.title: 2011-12-24 - Dummy Functions Added to Uize Base Module
item.description: A handful of dummy functions have been added to the Uize base module, that can be used in certain situations where you need to supply a dummy function as a handler, callback, or iterator function.

item.title: 2011-12-22 - JavaScript new Operator Now Optional
item.description: The JavaScript new operator is now optional when creating instances of Uize subclasses, and you can make the new operator optional for your own object constructors using the newly added Uize.noNew static method.

item.title: 2011-12-03 - Improved Uize.lookup and Uize.reverseLookup
item.description: The Uize.lookup and Uize.reverseLookup static methods have been improved with the added ability to specify a target object for adding entries.

item.title: 2011-11-29 - Unit Tests for Uize.Data.NameValueRecords
item.description: Comprehensive unit tests have been created for the Uize.Data.NameValueRecords module.

item.title: 2011-11-27 - Uize Base Gets Uize.forEach and Uize.map
item.description: The Uize base module has been improved with the addition of the new Uize.forEach and Uize.map static methods.

item.title: 2011-11-13 - New Utility Belt Features
item.description: The Uize base module has been given a boost with the addition of a slew of convenient utility belt features.

item.title: 2011-10-30 - NEW MODULE: Uize.Array.Util
item.description: The new Uize.Array.Util module provides a home for miscellaneous array utility methods that are not yet deemed ready for promototion to the Uize.Array or Uize modules.

item.title: 2011-10-18 - Deprecated Features of Uize.Template Killed
item.description: The Uize.Template.encoders and Uize.Template.decoders static properties of the Uize.Template module, that were deprecated back in April of 2010, have finally been killed.

item.title: 2011-10-11 - Various Broken Examples Fixed
item.description: Various JavaScript examples on the uize.com Web site that had become victims to bit rot have been restored to their former glory.

item.title: 2011-09-22 - Buttons With Incorrect Styling in IE9 Fixed
item.description: An issue that was causing button widgets to not have the correct mouse cursor when mousing over them in IE9 has been fixed.

item.title: 2011-09-21 - Broken Drag-and-drop in IE9 Fixed
item.description: An issue that was breaking the drag-and-drop functionality of the Uize.Widget.Drag class in IE9 has been fixed.

item.title: 2011-09-20 - Broken Pages in IE9 Fixed
item.description: An issue that was breaking pages of the uize.com Web site in IE9 has been fixed.

item.title: 2011-09-19 - Cloning of Regular Expressions in Safari Fixed
item.description: A minor issue that was discovered in Safari with the Uize.clone method when cloning regular expressions (ie. instances of the RegExp object) has been fixed.

item.title: 2011-09-18 - Fixed Running of Unit Tests in Browser
item.description: A problem that was causing the UIZE Unit Tests page to fail to run the test suite for UIZE has been fixed.

item.title: 2011-09-17 - Ad Hoc Property Registration Fixed
item.description: A problem that was discovered with the set-get properties mechanism and its support for ad hoc registration of properties has been fixed.

item.title: 2011-08-30 - Workaround for JScript For In Issue
item.description: An issue was discovered with the way that Microsoft's JScript interpreter, which is used in Internet Explorer and Windows Script Host, iterates through arrays in for...in loops.

item.title: 2011-07-26 - Thorough Set-get Properties Unit Tests
item.description: Thorough unit tests have been created for the set-get properties feature implemented in the Uize base class.

item.title: 2011-07-03 - Improved set Method in the Uize Base Class
item.description: The Uize.set static method and the set instance method, implemented in the Uize base class, have been improved to support an arbitrary number of arguments, allowing the values for multiple set-get properties to be specified as name-value pair arguments.

item.title: 2011-05-31 - More Uize Base Class Unit Tests
item.description: To help ensure the robustness and stability of the UIZE JavaScript Framework over time, more unit tests have been created for the Uize base class.

item.title: 2011-05-22 - Improved Uize.pairUp Method
item.description: The Uize.pairUp method, implemented in the Uize base class, has been improved with support for two new variations.

item.title: 2011-05-21 - JSON Serialization Improvements
item.description: The Uize.Json module has been improved with the addition of two convenient presets for serializing JavaScript objects to strict JSON format, according to the specification at json.org.

item.title: 2011-05-11 - Improved Declarative Widget Properties
item.description: The declarative syntax for widget properties has been improved to cover more cases.

item.title: 2011-05-05 - SimpleDoc Now Supports Section Title Aliases
item.description: The SimpleDoc format, a Wikitext like document format for easily writing structured documents, has added support for section title aliases.

item.title: 2011-04-12 - NEW METHOD: Uize.String.split
item.description: The new Uize.String.split method, implemented in the Uize.String module, splits a string into an array of elements using the specified splitter string or regular expression, in strict accordance with the ECMA-262 language's specified behavior for the String object's split instance method.

item.title: 2011-04-03 - NEW MODULE: Uize.Color.xCmyk
item.description: The new Uize.Color.xCmyk module extends the Uize.Color object by adding a profile for the CMYK color space, and by providing encodings for this color space.

item.title: 2011-03-29 - Uize on GitHub
item.description: The UIZE JavaScript Framework is now available on GitHub, so anybody can now fork the project to their heart's content.

item.title: 2011-03-24 - NEW EXAMPLE - Color Format Converter
item.description: The new Color Format Converter Tool lets you easily convert color values from one format to another.

item.title: 2011-03-23 - NEW MODULE: Uize.Util.PropertyAdapter
item.description: The new Uize.Util.PropertyAdapter module implements a mechanism for connecting two set-get properties together, with optional bi-directional value adapter code.

item.title: 2011-03-11 - Bug Fix For toString and valueOf Intrinsic Methods
item.description: An Internet Explorer specific problem with the toString intrinsic method and the valueOf intrinsic method, that are specially implemented for Uize subclasses, has been fixed.

item.title: 2011-03-10 - Improved Process for Announcing News
item.description: For developers of the UIZE JavaScript Framework, the process for adding news announcements has been improved and simplified, so that all that is required is to create a .simple file for a news item, and then the build process for the site will do the rest.

item.title: 2011-03-05 - Deprecated Features of Uize.Widget.Tree Killed
item.description: A number of instance and static methods of the Uize.Widget.Tree module that were deprecated a year ago have finally been killed.

item.title: 2011-02-21 - Unit Test Improvements
item.description: Unit tests for the UIZE JavaScript Framework have been improved in a number of ways, as outlined below...

item.title: 2011-02-11 - New ajax Method in Uize.Widget
item.description: The Uize.Widget module has been improved with the addition of the new ajax instance method.
